discussion.p: The first paragraph begins with a descriptions what has to be done in formatted output functions. Probably this is a typo and the paragraph really want to describe unformatted output functions...

resolution.p: In paragraph 1, the first and last sentences, change the word "formatted" to "unformatted":

blockquote.p:
"Each unformatted output function begins ..."
"... value specified for the unformatted output function."
